title: Secret Playlist
overview: Han Joo is your ordinary university studentâ€¦ except for the fact that she's also the up-and-coming Metube cover artist, PLII. When popular boy group member Levi takes notice of PLII and requests to collaborate, Han Joo will do anything to hide her secret identity. But as the two grow closer working on a class project, Han Joo's cover begins to unravel. Will Levi discover her secret?
